description: Enjoy a warm Merino/polyester blend that helps move sweat, dries quickly, and hold its shape during high-sweat activities in colder weather with our Men's Merino Sport 150 Henley. It's one of our most stylish tops, but also one of our best base layers for performance—designed to maximize comfort and minimize chafing as you explore easily with a pack on your back.
name: Smartwool Colorblock (150) LS Henley - Mens
